scenes.label: *start

options.chara: 汎用_ウィンド情報アプリ
汎用_ウィンド情報アプリ
汎用_ウィンド情報アプリ

texts: You spent an entire night together, huh?
Cross said that the moment he arrived at Symphony, with a serious expression on his face.
All right. By the way, you haven't gotten much sleep, have you?
Wh-why do you care?! S-spending a night with a girl is no big deal to me!
Actually...I meant you must've been on the lookout all night for whoever's after you.
He said the police actually visited my place, so spending the night at Symphony was the right idea.
The army, on the other hand, hadn't been up to much since their retreat, apparently.
Hearing that wasn't enough to put me at ease, though.
I'd spent the night bracing myself for a raid, and barely got any sleep.
I'd called Cross over to tell him about yesterday.
I told him about who was after Momo, and even mentioned the Saving and Loading thing I'd been using.
Momo was asleep on the only sofa we had. She didn't even wake up when Cross came in.
She must've been out of it.
Make sure you ask her about herself later. I know you're gonna stay involved with her.
I am. You know me real well, huh?
That aside, I was thinking about this whole Saving and Loading thing.
It's a pretty awesome app, huh? Could be crazy useful.
Listen, I strongly suggest that you don't use it blindly. Nothing—let alone an app—can do what you just described.
So he didn't actually believe it was real, huh?
I couldn't blame him, though. I was still 50-50 on it myself.
You mean that it could be a trap, right? I know that. That's why I want you to look into it.
Yeah of course, although...whoever we're dealing with, I might be totally outclassed—
That reminded me he'd left a comment on the Nakano Symphonies commissions page.
Yo. Wanna go out for lunch?
How do you know my contact info?
Answer my question. Or don't, if you wanna get on my bad side.
I got some influence here and there.
Out of everyone involved with yesterday's events, who could have connections to this guy...?
Oh, by the way, it looks like all that cracking you did yesterday has disappeared from the police database.
So yeah, there's no reason for them to take you downtown anymore.
This isn't just the police being nice though, is it?
I didn't know who was pulling the strings, or why, but they clearly had power over the police. I bet they'd gotten the army involved too.
We can talk about that, and more, when we meet. You know, have a little info exchange. Bring the girl with you too.
I didn't answer right away. Honestly, I couldn't. I was still just some guy determined to help Momo out.
And I had to find out how much this guy actually knew.
You got anything on this brat in a bow-tie?
You know him too? You just keep giving me more reasons to hear you out.
...I could vividly remember that boy who'd climbed out of the chopper yesterday.
He looked younger than me, but he was lording over the army, and acting like he was the boss.
I'd met him before the first Load, which meant that our meeting never actually happened.
If this guy knew something about that boy, it seemed like a good idea for us to talk.
If I wanted to help Momo as best as I could, I had to know as much about our enemies as possible.
I'll come if lunch is on you.

options.chara: 汎用_ウィンド情報アプリ

texts: 1 in the afternoon. A place called "Tohka," in Nakano's District 5. Don't be late.

options.chara: 汎用_ウィンド情報アプリ

texts: He ended the call without even giving me a map...

options.chara: 汎用_ウィンド情報アプリ

texts: Now was the time to decide what I was gonna tell Momo.

options.chara: 汎用_ウィンド情報アプリ

texts: She woke up a while later, and I told her about the meeting with Oz.
You're gonna ask for his help?
No. That's not what I'm thinking...
I just need to find out why this country's army was trying to capture me.
He said he wants an info exchange. We won't learn anything if we don't share something.
It looked like I wasn't the only one she wanted to keep in the dark.
It would've been better to let Momo explain it herself, but I couldn't keep a lid on it any longer.
They're the ones after you, right?
I saw them with my own eyes. I told you about the Saving and Loading thing, right?
What I don't know is who was after you yesterday. I should probably find out how they're connected to the Vatican, if they are.
Besides, I can't send you out there alone when you're up against an opponent that powerful.
I'm getting involved whether you like it or not.
By the way, you got any money?
We gotta do something about those clothes.
She said she had some money, so I took her to the Nakano shopping arcade, where she could get herself some clothes.
I was waiting at the arcade entrance, but she'd already been in there half an hour.
What's taking her so long? Did she just run off somewhere or what?
Well, even if we got separated now, I could find her again by heading to the place we were supposed to meet Oz.
Clothes shopping takes time for girls. Remember that.
Well, I'd just wait for her a while longer.

scenes.label: *fakesave
texts: That Oz guy seemed like a dangerous character, so it was probably a good idea to Save here.

scenes.label: *polonsave5
texts: Better to Save than be sorry.
I checked your BMI, but I didn't see any traces of tampering from the outside.
Couldn't even figure out where this Saving and Loading UI is stored.
So this stuff was beyond even Cross. You're one helluva hacker, giving me this Saving and Loading stuff.
I'm sorry to have kept you waiting.
Momo looked like a completely normal girl in her new fit. She wouldn't stand out at all now.
The place where Oz wanted to meet was like ten minutes away from where we were.
Momo had taken her sweet time getting her clothes, so it was gonna be a close one.

scenes.label: *load
texts: She did look better suited to city life, if that was what she meant. This outfit was way better than that pink costume, at least.
I'm glad to hear that. Let's go.

scenes.label: *select1
texts: Huh? What? Why did you just put that up?
You sayin' I should Load or something?
Why would I need to Load right now?
RIGHT! I just picked up what you put down.
...And so, I went back to the moment I Saved.
Part of me wondered whether yesterday was all a dream, or some illusion...
But it looked like it was all real.
And you just went and made me realize how rude I was being.
There's only one thing a man should do when he sees a girl in new clothes.
I had to praise her? But how?
I'd never praised a girl's clothing before.
And I had to say it right to her face... This wasn't gonna be easy.
No, get a grip. This is nothing. I can do this...!
Watch me. I'm gonna compliment Momo.
That said, I couldn't even think of the right words. What was I supposed to say?
I'm sorry to have kept you waiting.
I had to say something, but my mind was blank.
Umm... How should I say it... Uhh...
Really? And here I was, worried that I wouldn't fit in.
I'm glad to hear that. Thank you.
You actually said something decent. I'm surprised.
D-damn right I did! I'm a man of my word!
Umm...I think we should get going.
